Principal.title: Khalaf, João. Pleasure to meet you!
Principal.description: Software Developer with practical experience in web and mobile applications. I work with technologies such as JavaScript, React, TypeScript, Node.js, and Java, always focused on delivering measurable results and following agile methodologies. My main goal is to become a great professional.
Principal.funny: Apart from work, you'll often find me at the gym or gaming, 90% playing TFT or soulslike.

WritingPage.title: Writing.
WritingPage.comingSoon: One day I will have enough knowledge to write an article :)

bio.part1: I am a FullStack Developer and Internet Systems student at Fatec - RL, currently working as an intern and honing my skills in building solutions.
bio.part2: I'm going for the second year in a row as a Data Structure Monitor at college, it's been a great experience. Personally, I think I'm good at teaching, but that's something for the very distant future.
bio.part3: I have a growing interest in Data Analysis. My future goal is to work with Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, with the prospect of turning my professional trajectory towards the area of ​​data analysis.
